title: Obama Has To Balance His Base Without Hurting Dems In Red States
teaser: If Democrats have a chance of hanging onto Senate seats in southern states, they need to do well with African American voters. But for President Obama, that creates a difficult balance between turning out the base and energizing GOP voters who don't like him.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
